meanings.definition: A person who excels in sports and possesses exceptional physical abilities.
meanings.sent1: The superathlete won the race with incredible speed and strength.
meanings.sent2: The superathlete trained hard every day to become the best in their sport.
meanings.sent3: The superathlete's amazing skills on the field left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: Being a superathlete is like having superpowers in the world of sports.
meanings.sent5: The superathlete's dedication and talent made them a true champion.

meanings.definition: To perform at a level of athleticism that surpasses the norm.
meanings.sent1: She will superathlete her way through the competition with sheer determination.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to superathlete during important games to lead his team to victory.
meanings.sent3: Watching him superathlete during practice is both inspiring and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The team hopes to superathlete their way to the championship this season.
meanings.sent5: She managed to superathlete her way out of a tough situation with her quick reflexes.
